mapper.sql: ID = #{id}, TYPECODE = #{typecode}, INDICATORCODE = #{indicatorcode}, INDICATORNAME = #{indicatorname}, INDICATORTARGET = #{indicatortarget}, INDICATORDESC = #{indicatordesc}, INDICATORCAPTION = #{indicatorcaption}, INDICATORGROUP = #{indicatorgroup}, CALFORMULA = #{calformula}, DISPLAYORDER = #{displayorder}, ALERTFLAG = #{alertflag}, ALERTCYCLE = #{alertcycle}, PARENTINDICATORID = #{parentindicatorid}, REMARK = #{remark}, ENABLEDFLAG = #{enabledflag}, PARENTINDICATORCODE = #{parentindicatorcode}, INDLEVEL = #{indlevel}, CYC_COUNTTYPE = #{cycCounttype}, HASBUDGET = #{hasbudget}, SOURCEFROM = #{sourcefrom}, VALUETYPE = #{valuetype}, COUNTCYCLE = #{countcycle}, VALUEMAPPING = #{valuemapping}, CTCODE = #{ctcode}, INDICATORDETAIL = #{indicatordetail}, COUTORDER = #{coutorder}, ALERTTYPE = #{alerttype}, COMCODE = #{comcode}
mapper.select: select rownum rn, P_INDICATORS.ID, P_INDICATORS.TYPECODE, P_INDICATORS.INDICATORCODE, P_INDICATORS.INDICATORNAME, P_INDICATORS.INDICATORTARGET, P_INDICATORS.INDICATORDESC, P_INDICATORS.INDICATORCAPTION, P_INDICATORS.INDICATORGROUP, P_INDICATORS.CALFORMULA, P_INDICATORS.DISPLAYORDER, P_INDICATORS.ALERTFLAG, P_INDICATORS.ALERTCYCLE, P_INDICATORS.PARENTINDICATORID, P_INDICATORS.REMARK, P_INDICATORS.ENABLEDFLAG, P_INDICATORS.PARENTINDICATORCODE, P_INDICATORS.INDLEVEL, P_INDICATORS.CYC_COUNTTYPE, P_INDICATORS.HASBUDGET, P_INDICATORS.SOURCEFROM, P_INDICATORS.VALUETYPE, P_INDICATORS.COUNTCYCLE, P_INDICATORS.VALUEMAPPING, P_INDICATORS.CTCODE, P_INDICATORS.INDICATORDETAIL, P_INDICATORS.COUTORDER, P_INDICATORS.ALERTTYPE, P_INDICATORS.COMCODE, P_INDICATOR_TYPES.NAME from P_INDICATORS left join P_INDICATOR_TYPES on P_INDICATORS.TYPECODE=P_INDICATOR_TYPES.CODE where P_INDICATORS.ID = #{id}

mapper.select: SELECT ID, TYPECODE, INDICATORCODE, INDICATORNAME, INDICATORTARGET, INDICATORDESC, INDICATORCAPTION, INDICATORGROUP, CALFORMULA, DISPLAYORDER, ALERTFLAG, ALERTCYCLE, PARENTINDICATORID, REMARK, ENABLEDFLAG, PARENTINDICATORCODE, INDLEVEL, CYC_COUNTTYPE, HASBUDGET, SOURCEFROM, VALUETYPE, COUNTCYCLE, VALUEMAPPING, CTCODE, INDICATORDETAIL, COUTORDER, ALERTTYPE, COMCODE FROM P_INDICATORS
mapper.delete:
delete from P_INDICATORS where id in
#{arr}

delete from P_INDICATORS where id in
#{ids}
mapper.select:
select rownum rn, P_INDICATORS.ID, P_INDICATORS.TYPECODE, P_INDICATORS.INDICATORCODE, P_INDICATORS.INDICATORNAME, P_INDICATORS.INDICATORTARGET, P_INDICATORS.INDICATORDESC, P_INDICATORS.INDICATORCAPTION, P_INDICATORS.INDICATORGROUP, P_INDICATORS.CALFORMULA, P_INDICATORS.DISPLAYORDER, P_INDICATORS.ALERTFLAG, P_INDICATORS.ALERTCYCLE, P_INDICATORS.PARENTINDICATORID, P_INDICATORS.REMARK, P_INDICATORS.ENABLEDFLAG, P_INDICATORS.PARENTINDICATORCODE, P_INDICATORS.INDLEVEL, P_INDICATORS.CYC_COUNTTYPE, P_INDICATORS.HASBUDGET, P_INDICATORS.SOURCEFROM, P_INDICATORS.VALUETYPE, P_INDICATORS.COUNTCYCLE, P_INDICATORS.VALUEMAPPING, P_INDICATORS.CTCODE, P_INDICATORS.INDICATORDETAIL, P_INDICATORS.COUTORDER, P_INDICATORS.ALERTTYPE, P_INDICATORS.COMCODE, P_INDICATOR_TYPES.NAME from P_INDICATORS left join P_INDICATOR_TYPES on P_INDICATORS.TYPECODE=P_INDICATOR_TYPES.CODE
AND P_INDICATORS.TYPECODE like concat(concat('%',#{typecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND P_INDICATORS.INDICATORCODE LIKE concat(concat('%',#{indicatorcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND P_INDICATORS.ALERTFLAG LIKE concat(concat('%',#{alertflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND P_INDICATORS.INDICATORNAME LIKE concat(concat('%',#{indicatorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND P_INDICATORS.ENABLEDFLAG LIKE concat(concat('%',#{enabledflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}),'%')
AND P_INDICATORS.COMCODE LIKE concat(concat('%',#{comcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND P_INDICATORS.ID = #{id}

select count(ID) from (select rownum rn, ID, TYPECODE, INDICATORCODE, INDICATORNAME, INDICATORTARGET, INDICATORDESC, INDICATORCAPTION, INDICATORGROUP, CALFORMULA, DISPLAYORDER, ALERTFLAG, ALERTCYCLE, PARENTINDICATORID, REMARK, ENABLEDFLAG, PARENTINDICATORCODE, INDLEVEL, CYC_COUNTTYPE, HASBUDGET, SOURCEFROM, VALUETYPE, COUNTCYCLE, VALUEMAPPING, CTCODE, INDICATORDETAIL, COUTORDER, ALERTTYPE, COMCODE from P_INDICATORS )a
AND TYPECODE like concat(concat('%',#{typecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND INDICATORCODE LIKE concat(concat('%',#{indicatorcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND ALERTFLAG LIKE concat(concat('%',#{alertflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND INDICATORNAME LIKE concat(concat('%',#{indicatorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND ENABLEDFLAG LIKE concat(concat('%',#{enabledflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}),'%')
AND COMCODE LIKE concat(concat('%',#{comcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
select ID,INDICATORCODE from P_INDICATORS where ID=#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
